property.name: plugin.includes
property.description: Enable all plugins during unit testing.

property.name: distributed.search.test.port
property.description: TCP port used during junit testing.

property.name: storage.data.store.class
property.description: Default in-memory datastore class for temp test data.

property.name: db.fetch.interval.default
property.description: The default number of seconds between re-fetches of a page (30 days).

property.name: restapi.auth
property.description: Configures authentication type for communicating with RESTAPI. Valid values are BASIC, DIGEST, SSL and NONE. When no authentication type is defined NONE will be used as default which does not provide security. Use the restapi.auth.username and restapi.auth.password properties to configure your credentials if security is used.

property.name: restapi.auth.users
property.description: Username, password and role combination for REST API authentication/authorization. restapi.auth property should be set to either BASIC or DIGEST to use this property. Username, password and role should be delimited by pipe character (|) Every user should be separated with comma character (,). i.e. admin|admin|admin,user|user|user. Default is admin|admin|admin,user|user|user

property.name: restapi.auth.ssl.storepath
property.description: Key store path for jks file. restapi.auth property should be set to SSL to use this property. etc/nutch-ssl.keystore.jks is used for restapi.auth.ssl.storepath as default.

property.name: restapi.auth.ssl.storepass
property.description: Key store path for jks file. restapi.auth property should be set to SSL to use this property. "password" is used for restapi.auth.ssl.storepass as default.

property.name: restapi.auth.ssl.keypass
property.description: Key store path for jks file. restapi.auth property should be set to SSL to use this property. "password" is used for restapi.auth.ssl.keypass as default.
